bug.author: mingmingtasd
bug.summary: There are some errors related to undefined reference to pugi
bug.description:
Hiï¼Œ I am building openvino into chrome image and find that there are some errors related to undefined reference to pugi, such as: ld.lld: error: /build/octopus/tmp/portage/chromeos-base/inference-engine-9999/work/inference-engine-9999/bin/intel64/Debug/lib/libinference_engine_legacy.so: undefined reference to pugi::xml_attribute::set_value(float). Please get details as below: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52519066/100301870-12357e80-2fd4-11eb-8cc2-796bbadd23c9.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52519066/100301942-3b560f00-2fd4-11eb-8662-33bc424558b5.png></denchmark-link>
Would help to give some suggestions? Thanks a lot!

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mingmingtasd>@mingmingtasd</denchmark-link> could you please provide link command for legacy library? Does not <denchmark-link:https://github.com/openvinotoolkit/openvino/pull/3376>#3376</denchmark-link> help for you?
